title: All Stars, Veterans and Boxers
teaser:
A 16 year-old takes her little brother on a cross country goose chase in order to use free tickets to an All Star Game; a young man wants to finally meet his troubled Vietnam Vet father; a grandmother demonstrates her boxing moves and a cousin has a secret life. Hosted by Moth Senior Producer, Jenifer Hixson.

The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media in Woods Hole Massachusetts
contentencoded:
Michaela Murphy takes her little brother on a cross country adventure to see an All Star Game.
 
Graham Shelby first sees his Vietnam vet father on a television special.
 
Lily Be discovers her grandmother’s love, but only after a fist fight.
 
Corey Rosen adores his 80 year old Uncle Norman.
